sql.query: delete from FILINGS_BANK43 where app_no=?

select npa_status, npa_appno from npa_application, npa_demographics where npa_appno=npa_demoappno and npa_democbsid='^' and npa_moduletype='^' and (npa_status='op' or npa_status='pp' or npa_status='pa' or npa_status='pr')

select npa_appno, npa_status, npa_holduser from npa_application, npa_demographics where npa_moduletype='^' and npa_democbsid='^' and npa_demoapptype='^' and npa_demoappno=npa_appno order by npa_appno desc
select cbsnpa_custid, cbsnpa_custname, org_name from cbs_npabasic, organisations where upper(cbsnpa_custname) like upper('%^%') and cbsnpa_custbranch=solid ^
select cbsnpa_custid, cbsnpa_custname, org_name from cbs_npabasic, organisations where cbsnpa_custid=trim('^') and cbsnpa_custbranch=solid ^
select cbsnpa_custid, cbsnpa_custname from cbs_npabasic where upper(cbsnpa_custname) like upper('%^%') and cbs_npatype='N'
select NVL(substr(max(npa_appno),^,15),'0') from npa_application where substr(npa_appno,1,^)='^'
insert into npa_demographics(npa_demoappno, npa_democbsid, npa_demoapptype) values(?,?,?)
insert into npa_application(npa_appno, npa_createddate, npa_createdby, npa_moduletype, npa_orgcode, npa_status, npa_delflag, npa_holduser,npa_orgscode) values(?,sysdate,?,?,?,'op','n',?,?)

insert into npa_presentposition(pre_appno,pre_nature, pre_amount, pre_running_outstand, npa_module_type, pre_sno, pre_accno) select ?, fund_schemecode, fund_sancamt, abs(fund_osamt), ? , cbsnpa_sno.nextval, fund_accno from mon_fundbased where fund_custid=?

update npacompromisepage1 set compro_proposal=?, compro_provision=?, compro_otsamount=?, compro_counteramount=?, compro_effectprofit=?, compro_fraud=?, compro_defaulter=?, compro_ecgc=?, compro_excessdate=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),compro_pwo=?, COMPRO_BUSINATURE=? ,COMPRO_NPASINCE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') where compro_appno=?

select compro_proposal, compro_preclass, compro_provision, compro_otsamount, compro_counteramount, compro_effectprofit, compro_presentact, to_char(compro_banksince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as compro_banksince, to_char(compro_advancesince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as compro_advancesince, to_char(compro_npasince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as compro_npasince, compro_fraud,compro_defaulter, compro_ecgc, to_char(compro_excessdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as compro_excessdate, compro_pwo, compro_businature, compro_branch, sd1.stat_data_desc1 as compro_comstitution, sd2.stat_data_desc1 as asset_classification, org_code,solid, org_name,sd3.STAT_DATA_DESC1 as compro_sectorcode from npacompromisepage1, organisations, static_data sd1, static_data sd2, static_data sd3 where compro_branch=solid and compro_appno='^' and sd1.stat_data_desc(+)=compro_comstitution and sd1.stat_data_id(+)='14' and sd2.stat_data_desc(+)=compro_preclass and sd2.stat_data_id(+)='31' and sd3.stat_data_desc(+)=to_number(compro_sectorcode) and sd3.stat_data_id(+)='18'
delete from npacompromisepage1 where compro_appno=?

select sta_appno, sta_presentabove, sta_bankarrangement, sta_unit, sta_working, to_char(sta_date_since,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sta_date_since, sta_sourceoflive, to_char(sta_npa_sincedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sta_npa_sincedate ,sta_presentasset, to_char(sta_provisionassetdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sta_provisionassetdate,sta_provision, to_char(sta_datelastreview,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sta_datelastreview ,sta_lastreviewby , sta_design, sta_scale, to_char(sta_lastfinancedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sta_lastfinancedate, to_char(sta_excessdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sta_excessdate, sta_maxexcessallowed, sta_stepstaken, status_note,sta_gua_present,to_char(sta_banksince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sta_banksince, to_char(sta_advancesince,'dd/mm/yyyy')as sta_advancesince, sta_consititution, sta_activity, sd1.stat_data_desc1 as constitution , sd2.stat_data_desc1 as assetclassification, sta_branch, org_code, solid, sta_regaddr, sta_facaddr, sta_facpremises from npa_statuspage1_part1, static_data sd1, static_data sd2, organisations where sta_branch=solid and sta_appno='^' and sd1.stat_data_desc(+)=sta_consititution and sd1.stat_data_id(+)='14' and sd2.stat_data_desc(+)=sta_presentasset and sd2.stat_data_id(+)='31'

insert into npa_statuspage1_part1(sta_appno, sta_banksince, sta_consititution, sta_activity, sta_presentasset, sta_branch, sta_regaddr) select ?, PERSONAL_BANKINGSINCE, PERSONAL_CONSTITUTION, PERSONAL_NATOFACTIVITY, PERSONAL_CLASSIFICATION, ?, personal_address||' ' ||personal_address1||' '||personal_city||' '||personal_state||' '||personal_pincode from mon_personalinfo where PERSONAL_CBSID=?

update NPA_statuspage1_part1 set sta_presentabove=?, sta_bankarrangement=?, sta_unit=?, sta_working=?, sta_date_since=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), sta_sourceoflive=?, sta_provisionassetdate=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), sta_provision=?, sta_lastreviewby=?, sta_design=?, sta_scale=?, sta_lastfinancedate=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), sta_excessdate=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), sta_maxexcessallowed=?, sta_stepstaken=?, status_note=?, sta_gua_present=?, sta_facaddr=?, sta_facpremises=?, STA_NPA_SINCEDATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') where sta_appno=?
delete from NPA_statuspage1_part1 where sta_appno=?

select sta_appno, sta_sno, sta_consortium, sta_sharing_pattern, sta_present_outstand, sta_status, sta_name_institution, sta_share_pattern, sta_outstand, sta_banker_name, sta_limitenjoy, sta_bankerstatus, sta_parners_name, sta_bankers_name1 from NPA_statuspage1_part2 where sta_appno='^'

insert into Npa_statuspage1_part2(sta_appno, sta_sno, sta_consortium, sta_sharing_pattern, sta_present_outstand, sta_status, sta_name_institution, sta_share_pattern, sta_outstand, sta_banker_name, sta_limitenjoy, sta_bankerstatus, sta_parners_name, sta_bankers_name1) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from Npa_statuspage1_part2 where sta_appno=?

select APPNO_NPA, APPSNO_NPA, APP_TYPE_NPA, APP_NAME_NPA, PRESENTACTIVITY_NPA, RENEW_MEANS_NPA, to_char(RENEW_DATE_NPA, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as RENEW_DATE_NPA, PRESENT_MEANS_NPA, to_char(PRESENT_DATE_NPA, 'dd/mm/yyyy')as PRESENT_DATE_NPA, NPA_MODULE_type, APP_ADDRESS, APP_PHONE, STAT_DATA_DESC1, STAT_DATA_SNO from NPA_BORROWER_DETAILS,STATIC_DATA where APPNO_NPA='^' and NPA_MODULE_TYPE='^' AND STAT_DATA_DESC(+)=APP_TYPE_NPA and stat_data_id(+)='44' ORDER BY APPSNO_NPA
select nvl(max(APPSNO_NPA),0)+1 as APPSNO_NPA from NPA_BORROWER_DETAILS where APPNO_NPA='^' and NPA_MODULE_TYPE='^'
select sum(present_means_npa) as aggregatemeans from npa_borrower_details where appno_npa='^'

insert into NPA_BORROWER_DETAILS(APPNO_NPA, APPSNO_NPA, APP_TYPE_NPA, APP_NAME_NPA, PRESENTACTIVITY_NPA, RENEW_MEANS_NPA, RENEW_DATE_NPA, PRESENT_MEANS_NPA, PRESENT_DATE_NPA, APP_ADDRESS, APP_PHONE, NPA_MODULE_TYPE)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?)

update NPA_BORROWER_DETAILS set APP_TYPE_NPA=?, APP_NAME_NPA=?, PRESENTACTIVITY_NPA=?, RENEW_MEANS_NPA=?, RENEW_DATE_NPA=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), PRESENT_MEANS_NPA=?, PRESENT_DATE_NPA=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), APP_ADDRESS=?, APP_PHONE=? where APPNO_NPA=? and APPSNO_NPA=? and NPA_MODULE_TYPE=?
delete from NPA_BORROWER_DETAILS where APPNO_NPA=? and APPSNO_NPA=? and NPA_MODULE_TYPE=?

select appno, account_classified, account_classified_reason, account_placedunder, account_placedunder_reason, ots,ots_reason, ecgc_position, bifr_account, takeover_account, takeover_bank, guarantee, particular_guarantee, fraud_account, to_char(fraud_accountdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fraud_accountdate, terms_sanction, terms_sanction_not_complied, to_char(latest_docdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as latest_docdate, to_char(dbc_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dbc_date, vetted_by_advocates, to_char(vetteddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as vetteddate,vetting_authority,advocates_name, discrepancies, suit,to_char(suitdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as suitdate, suit_amount, present_position, advocates_name1, advocates_telno, action_under_sarfaesia, to_char(issueddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as issueddate, possession_notice, to_char(possession_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as possession_date, possession_taken, to_char(possession_taken_date,'dd/mm/yyyy')as possession_taken_date, asset_sold, asset_sold_amt, to_char(asset_sold_date,'dd/mm/yyyy')as asset_sold_date, others, agent_appointed, agent_reason from NPA_STATUSNOTEPAGE2 where appno='^'
delete from NPA_STATUSNOTEPAGE2 where APPNO=?

insert into NPA_STATUSNOTEPAGE2 (appno, account_classified, account_classified_reason, account_placedunder, account_placedunder_reason, ots,ots_reason, ecgc_position, bifr_account, takeover_account, takeover_bank, guarantee, particular_guarantee, fraud_account, fraud_accountdate, terms_sanction, terms_sanction_not_complied, latest_docdate, dbc_date, vetted_by_advocates, vetteddate, vetting_authority, advocates_name, discrepancies, suit, suitdate, suit_amount, present_position, advocates_name1, advocates_telno, action_under_sarfaesia, issueddate, possession_notice, possession_date, possession_taken, possession_taken_date, asset_sold, asset_sold_amt, asset_sold_date, others, agent_appointed, agent_reason) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), ?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), ?,?,?,?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), ?,?,?,?,?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), ?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?)
select sn_no, ref_no, to_char(ref_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as ref_date,hearing_status from NPA_STATUSNOTEPAGE21 where APPNO='^'
insert into NPA_STATUSNOTEPAGE21(APPNO, sn_no, ref_no, ref_date, hearing_status) values (?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)
delete from NPA_STATUSNOTEPAGE21 where APPNO=?
select pwo_amt,to_char(pwo_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as pwo_date,pwo_recovery from NPA_STATUSNOTEPAGE22 where APP_NO='^'
delete from NPA_STATUSNOTEPAGE22 where APP_NO=?
insert into NPA_STATUSNOTEPAGE22(APP_NO, pwo_amt, pwo_date, pwo_recovery) values (?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)

select PRE_APPNO, PRE_SNO, PRE_NATURE, PRE_AMOUNT, PRE_RUNNING_OUTSTAND, PRE_PRODENTIAL, PRE_ECGC_CLAIM, PRE_SUBTOTAL, PRE_UNRECOVER, PRE_NETDUES, to_char(PRE_DUMMY_FROMDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY')as PRE_DUMMY_FROMDATE, to_char(PRE_DUMMY_TODATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as PRE_DUMMY_TODATE, PRE_DUMMY_LEDGER, PRE_EXPENSES, PRE_TOTAL_DUES, NPA_MODULE_TYPE, pre_claimlodgedos, pre_coverpercentavail, pre_claimadmitted, pre_claimsettled,pre_notionalinterest, stat_data_desc1 as facility FROM NPA_PRESENTPOSITION,static_data WHERE PRE_APPNO='^' and NPA_MODULE_TYPE='^' and stat_data_id(+)='36' and trim(PRE_NATURE)=stat_data_desc ORDER BY PRE_SNO

UPDATE NPA_PRESENTPOSITION SET PRE_NATURE=?, PRE_AMOUNT=?, PRE_RUNNING_OUTSTAND=?, PRE_PRODENTIAL=?, PRE_ECGC_CLAIM=?, PRE_SUBTOTAL=?, PRE_UNRECOVER=?, PRE_NETDUES=?, PRE_DUMMY_FROMDATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), PRE_DUMMY_TODATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), PRE_DUMMY_LEDGER=?, PRE_EXPENSES=?, PRE_TOTAL_DUES=?, pre_claimlodgedos=?, pre_coverpercentavail=?, pre_claimadmitted=?, pre_claimsettled=?,pre_notionalinterest=? WHERE PRE_APPNO=? and PRE_SNO=? and NPA_MODULE_TYPE=?

insert into NPA_PRESENTPOSITION(PRE_APPNO, PRE_SNO, PRE_NATURE, PRE_AMOUNT, PRE_RUNNING_OUTSTAND, PRE_PRODENTIAL, PRE_ECGC_CLAIM, PRE_SUBTOTAL, PRE_UNRECOVER, PRE_NETDUES, PRE_DUMMY_FROMDATE, PRE_DUMMY_TODATE, PRE_DUMMY_LEDGER, PRE_EXPENSES, PRE_TOTAL_DUES, NPA_MODULE_TYPE, pre_claimlodgedos, pre_coverpercentavail, pre_claimadmitted, pre_claimsettled,pre_notionalinterest) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE NPA_PRESENTPOSITION SET PRE_NATURE=?, PRE_AMOUNT=?, PRE_RUNNING_OUTSTAND=?, PRE_PRODENTIAL=?, PRE_ECGC_CLAIM=?,PRE_SUBTOTAL=?, PRE_UNRECOVER=?, PRE_NETDUES=?, PRE_DUMMY_FROMDATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), PRE_DUMMY_TODATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), PRE_DUMMY_LEDGER=?, PRE_EXPENSES=?, PRE_TOTAL_DUES=?, pre_claimlodgedos=?, PRE_COVERPERCENTAVAIL=?, pre_claimadmitted=?, pre_claimsettled=?,pre_notionalinterest=? WHERE PRE_APPNO=? and PRE_SNO=? and NPA_MODULE_TYPE=?
update npa_presentposition set pre_dummy_fromdate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), pre_dummy_todate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where pre_appno=? and npa_module_type=?

select sum(pre_subtotal) as subtotal,sum(pre_amount) as sanctionedamount,sum(pre_running_outstand) as runningos, sum(pre_prodential) as prudentailamt, sum(pre_ecgc_claim) as ecgcclaimedamt, sum(pre_unrecover) as unrecoveredint, sum(pre_netdues) as netdues, sum(pre_dummy_ledger) as dummyledgeros, sum(pre_expenses) as legalotrexp, sum(pre_total_dues) as totaldues,sum(pre_notionalinterest) as totnotionalinterest from npa_presentposition where pre_appno='^'
select (to_date(PRE_DUMMY_toDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')-to_date(PRE_DUMMY_fromDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')) as duedate from NPA_PRESENTPOSITION where PRE_APPNO='^'
select NVL(max(pre_sno),0)+1 as present_sno from NPA_PRESENTPOSITION WHERE PRE_APPNO='^' and NPA_MODULE_TYPE='^'
select sta_briefhistory, sta_reasonirrugular, sta_staffaccount, actionplan, brhistory from npa_statuspage3 where sta_appno='^'
insert into npa_statuspage3(sta_appno,sta_briefhistory, sta_reasonirrugular,sta_staffaccount,actionplan) values(?,?,?,?,?)
delete from npa_statuspage3 where sta_appno=?

select sta_appno, sta_ots, sta_otspossible, sta_details, sta_measures, to_char(sta_sanctiondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sta_sanctiondate, sta_sanctionauth, sta_pwoamount, sta_dummyamount, sta_legalcharge, sta_totaldues, sta_claimamount, sta_settleamount, sta_writeoff, sta_waiver, sta_absortion, sta_totalrelief, sta_recoveryeffect, sta_balanceeffect, sta_overdues from npa_statusnoteots where sta_appno='^'

insert into npa_statusnoteots(sta_appno, sta_ots, sta_otspossible, sta_details, sta_measures, sta_sanctiondate, sta_sanctionauth, sta_pwoamount, sta_dummyamount, sta_legalcharge, sta_totaldues, sta_claimamount, sta_settleamount, sta_writeoff, sta_waiver, sta_absortion, sta_totalrelief, sta_recoveryeffect, sta_balanceeffect, sta_overdues)values(?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update npa_statusnoteots set sta_ots=?, sta_otspossible=?, sta_details=?, sta_measures=?, sta_sanctiondate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), sta_sanctionauth=?, sta_pwoamount=?, sta_dummyamount=?, sta_legalcharge=?, sta_totaldues=?, sta_claimamount=?, sta_settleamount=?, sta_writeoff=?, sta_waiver=?, sta_absortion=?, sta_totalrelief=?, sta_recoveryeffect=?, sta_balanceeffect=?, sta_overdues=? where sta_appno=?
delete from npa_statusnoteots where sta_appno=?

select sta_appno, sta_sno, sta_security, to_char(sta_valuationdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sta_valuationdate, sta_valuationamount, to_char(sta_dateofsale,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sta_dateofsale, to_char(sta_dateofauction,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sta_dateofauction, sta_saleamount, to_char(sta_saleconfirmationdate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as sta_saleconfirmationdate, to_char(sta_appropriatedaccountdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sta_appropriatedaccountdate from npa_statuspagesarfaesia2 where sta_appno='^'
delete from npa_statuspagesarfaesia2 where sta_appno=?

insert into npa_statuspagesarfaesia2(sta_appno, sta_sno, sta_security, sta_valuationdate, sta_valuationamount, sta_dateofsale, sta_dateofauction, sta_saleamount, sta_saleconfirmationdate, sta_appropriatedaccountdate) values(?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'))

select sta_appno, sta_undersarfaesia, to_char(sta_demandnoticedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sta_demandnoticedate, sta_positionnotice, sta_notpositionreason, to_char(sta_positionnoticedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sta_positionnoticedate, sta_positionnoticedate, sta_positiontaken, sta_approached, sta_detailsofapplication, sta_nottakingposition from npa_statuspagesarfaesia1 where sta_appno='^'

select SECU_SNO, SECU_SECURITIES_TYPE, SECU_NATURE, to_char(SECU_RENEW_VALUEDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as SECU_RENEW_VALUEDATE, SECU_RENEW_VALUEAMOUNT, to_char(SECU_PRESENT_VALUEDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY')as SECU_PRESENT_VALUEDATE, SECU_PRESENT_VALUEAMOUNT, to_char(SECU_PRESENT_INSPECDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY')as SECU_PRESENT_INSPECDATE, SECU_PRESENT_INSPECTEDBY, NPA_MODULE_TYPE from NPA_SECURITIES where SECU_APPNO='^' AND NPA_MODULE_TYPE='^' AND UPPER(SECU_SECURITIES_TYPE)=UPPER('C')
select sum(secu_present_valueamount) as presentvalue from npa_securities where secu_appno='^'

insert into npa_securities (secu_sno, secu_securities_type, secu_nature, secu_renew_valuedate, secu_renew_valueamount, npa_module_type,secu_appno) select cbsnpa_sno.nextval, cbsnpa_typeofsecurity, cbsnpa_securitynature, cbsnpa_securityvaluationdate, cbsnpa_securityvalue, ?, ? from cbs_npasecurities where cbsnpa_custid = ?
delete npa_securities where npa_appno=? and npa_borrowerid=?

insert into npa_securities(npa_borrowerid, npa_appno, npa_sectype, npa_lmarket, npa_lrealise, npa_ldateofins, npa_inspection, npa_pmarket, npa_prealise, npa_pdateofins, npa_inspection1, npa_vmarket, npa_vrealise,npa_vdateofins, npa_inspection2, npa_smarket, npa_srealise, npa_sdateofins, npa_inspection3, npa_bmarket, npa_brealise,npa_bdateofins, npa_inspection4, npa_bemarket, npa_berealise, npa_bedateofins, npa_inspection5, npa_omarket, npa_orealise, npa_odateofins, npa_inspection6) values(?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?)

select suit_decreed, suit_sectoralcat, suit_amount, suit_courtname, suit_no, to_char(suit_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as suit_date, siut_running, siut_outstanding, siut_securityvalueadvance, siut_presentmarketvalue, to_char(suit_dateofvaluation,'dd/mm/yyyy') as suit_dateofvaluation,suit_recoveryhalf, suit_totalrecovery, to_char(suit_dateofdecree,'dd/mm/yyyy') as suit_dateofdecree, to_char(suit_dateoffilling,'dd/mm/yyyy') as suit_dateoffilling, suit_advocatename, suit_address, suit_phoneno, suit_presentposition, suit_olappointed, suit_saleofstatus, suit_facility, suit_legalproceeding, suit_counterclaim, suit_workercompensation, suit_Statliabilities, suit_Contiliabilities, suit_Others, suit_pendingcriminal, suit_attachment, suit_noreason, suit_process,suit_decreeamount,suit_advocatesno from npa_statusSuitfield where appno='^'

insert into npa_statusSuitfield(appno, suit_decreed, suit_sectoralcat, suit_amount, suit_courtname, suit_no, suit_date, siut_running, siut_outstanding, siut_securityvalueadvance, siut_presentmarketvalue, suit_dateofvaluation, suit_recoveryhalf, suit_totalrecovery, suit_dateofdecree, suit_dateoffilling, suit_advocatename, suit_address, suit_phoneno, suit_presentposition, suit_olappointed, suit_saleofstatus, suit_facility, suit_legalproceeding, suit_counterclaim, suit_workercompensation, suit_Statliabilities, suit_Contiliabilities, suit_Others, suit_pendingcriminal, suit_attachment, suit_noreason, suit_process, suit_modified_date, suit_modified_user, suit_decreeamount,suit_advocatesno) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') ,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?)
delete from npa_statusSuitfield where appno=?

select npa_appno,personal_cbsid, personal_custname, npa_status, npa_demoapptype, npa_moduletype, npa_holduser,npa_orgscode, org_name from npa_application, npa_demographics, mon_personalinfo, organisations where personal_cbsid=npa_democbsid and npa_demoappno=npa_appno and org_scode=npa_orgscode and npa_appno='^'
select npa_appno,TO_CHAR(npa_processeddate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as processeddate from npa_application where npa_appno='^'
select npa_status,npa_holduser,npa_processedby from npa_application where npa_appno='^'
select to_char(npa_createddate,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') from npa_application where npa_appno='^'
update npa_application set npa_status=?, npa_processeddate=sysdate, npa_processedby=? where npa_appno=?

select npa_auditorcomment, npa_officerscomment, to_char(npa_auditdate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as npa_auditdate, npa_audittype from npa_auditcomments where npa_appno='^' and npa_audittype='^' and NPA_MODULE_TYPE='^'
select npa_auditorcomment, npa_officerscomment, to_char(npa_auditdate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as npa_auditdate, npa_audittype from npa_auditcomments where npa_appno='^'and NPA_MODULE_TYPE='^'
delete from npa_auditcomments where npa_appno= ? and npa_audittype= ? and NPA_MODULE_TYPE=?
insert into npa_auditcomments (npa_appno, npa_audittype, npa_auditorcomment, npa_officerscomment, npa_auditdate, NPA_MODULE_TYPE) values(?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)
insert into prudentialpage1(app_no, constitution, activity, prod_branch) select ?, personal_constitution, personal_natofactivity, ? from mon_personalinfo where personal_cbsid=?

update prudentialpage1 set provision=?, advancesince=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), banktype=?, proposaltype=?, nominalbalance=?, npasince=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), doubtlosssince=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), unit_running=?, date_unitrunning=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), unit_work=?, livehood=? where app_no=?

select app_no, provision, constitution, to_char(advancesince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as advancesince, to_char(npasince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as npasince, to_char(doubtlosssince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as doubtlosssince, activity, banktype, proposaltype, nominalbalance,stat_data_desc1 as constitutiontype,prod_branch,org_code,solid, org_name, unit_running, to_char(date_unitrunning,'dd/mm/yyyy') as date_unitrunning, unit_work, livehood from prudentialpage1, organisations, static_data where prod_branch=solid and app_no='^' and stat_data_id(+)='14' and stat_data_desc(+)=constitution
delete from PRUDENTIALPAGE1 where app_no=?

select DOCUMENT_NAME,to_char(DOCUMENT_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY')as DOCUMENT_DATE, to_char(DOCUMENT_EXPIRYDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY')as DOCUMENT_EXPIRYDATE, DOCUMENT_ENFORCEABLE,to_char(DATE_CERTIFICATION,'DD/MM/YYYY')as DATE_CERTIFICATION, DOCUMENT_TYPE from SARFAESI_DOCUMENT where APP_NO = '^' and SARF_DOCNO = '^'

select FIL_NATURE_FACILITY,FIL_AMOUNT,FIL_SECURITY,FIL_RATEOFINTERST,to_char(FIL_DATEOFDOCUMENT,'DD/MM/YYYY')as FIL_DATEOFDOCUMENT,stat_data_desc1 as facility from FILINGSOFSUIT_LIMITSANCTIONED,STATIC_DATA where APP_NO = '^' and FIL_SNO = '^' and trim(FIL_NATURE_FACILITY) = STAT_DATA_DESC

select FIL_TERM_NAME,to_char(FIL_DISBURSE_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY')as FIL_DISBURSE_DATE,FIL_SEL_TERMTYPE,FIL_REGNAMENOINSTALMENT_REC, FIL_NO_INSTALMENTS,FIL_AMOUNT_INSRECEIVED,FIL_INS_AMOUNTS,to_char(FIL_INSTALMENT_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY')as FIL_INSTALMENT_DATE, to_char(FIL_START_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY')as FIL_START_DATE,to_char(FIL_PAYMENT_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY')as FIL_PAYMENT_DATE,to_char(FIL_LAST_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY')as FIL_LAST_DATE from FILINGSUIT_TERM where APP_NO = '^' and FIL_SNO = '^'
select security_type,fil_location,fil_descript,fil_owner,to_char(fil_date,'DD/MM/YYYY')as fil_date from FILINGS_LOCATION where APP_NO = '^' and FIL_SNO = '^'
select fil_Nature,fil_Present,to_char(fil_Dateupto,'DD/MM/YYYY')as fil_Dateupto,fil_Amountdbc,to_char(fil_Datedbc,'DD/MM/YYYY')as fil_Datedbc from FILINGS_DBC5 where APP_NO = '^' and FIL_SNO = '^'
select FIL_FACILITY,to_char(FIL_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY')as FIL_DATE,FIL_AMOUNT from FILINGS_DEPOSIT where APP_NO = '^' and FIL_SNO = '^'
select aggregate_id from NPA_AGGREGATEMEANS where '^' between MIN_PERCENTAGE and MAX_PERCENTAGE
select realisible_id from realisible_values where '^' between min_percentage and max_percentage and realisible_value = '^'
select npa_sno from npa_ageofnpa where '^' between npa_minofage and npa_maxage

select distinct(cust_id),cust_name,org_name from npa_prov_acc_data,organisations where org_scode=org_soldid ^ union select distinct(cust_id),cust_name,org_name from npa_prov_acc_data_old,organisations where org_scode=org_soldid ^

select cust_id,cust_name,org_name from (select distinct(cust_id),cust_name,org_name from npa_prov_acc_data,organisations where org_scode=org_soldid ^ union select distinct(perapp_cbsid),perapp_fname,org_name from perapplicant,organisations where org_scode=perapp_branchcode ^) Order by cust_name

select execution_no,to_char(as_on_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as as_on_date,cust_id,cust_name,acc_no,org_soldid,to_char(npa_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as npa_date,sanc_limit,os_limit,unreal_int_val, coverage_val_sanc,coverage_percnt,coverage_val_present,unsec_os_limit,prime_sec_val, fraud_applnt,loan_type,proposal_no,proposal_sno,os_percnt,norm_status,prov_value, decode(loan_type,'C','Corporate','A','Agriculture','S','SBCA Account','Retail') as type,o1.org_name,o2.org_name as regionname,npa_mannualflag,write_off,othr_charges,npa_sbca_acc,npa_reason from npa_prov_acc_data,organisations o1,organisations o2 where o2.org_code like substr(o1.ORG_CODE,0,6)||'%%%%' and o2.org_level='R' and o1.org_scode=org_soldid and cust_id='^' and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N'

update npa_prov_acc_data set npa_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),os_limit=?,SANC_LIMIT=?,UNREAL_INT_VAL=?, UNSEC_OS_LIMIT=?,PRIME_SEC_VAL=?,FRAUD_APPLNT=?,NORM_STATUS=?,PROV_VALUE=?,WRITE_OFF=?,OTHR_CHARGES=?,NPA_SBCA_ACC=?,NPA_REASON=? ,NPA_PROV_USER_ID=? where acc_no=? and EXECUTION_NO=?

insert into NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC(EXECUTION_NO,AS_ON_DATE,CUST_ID,CUST_NAME,ACC_NO,ORG_SOLDID,NPA_DATE,SANC_LIMIT,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,COVERAGE_PERCNT,COVERAGE_VAL_PRESENT,UNSEC_OS_LIMIT,PRIME_SEC_VAL, FRAUD_APPLNT,LOAN_TYPE,PROPOSAL_NO,PROPOSAL_SNO,OS_PERCNT,NORM_STATUS,PROV_VALUE,NPA_PROV_USER_ID,npa_sno,modified_date,NPA_REASON,NPA_MANNUALFLAG) select distinct EXECUTION_NO,AS_ON_DATE,CUST_ID,CUST_NAME,ACC_NO,ORG_SOLDID,NPA_DATE,SANC_LIMIT,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,COVERAGE_PERCNT,COVERAGE_VAL_PRESENT,UNSEC_OS_LIMIT,PRIME_SEC_VAL, FRAUD_APPLNT,LOAN_TYPE,PROPOSAL_NO,PROPOSAL_SNO,OS_PERCNT,NORM_STATUS,PROV_VALUE,NPA_PROV_USER_ID,(select NVL(max(npa_sno),0)+1 as maxid from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC where ACC_NO=? and EXECUTION_NO=? ) as sno,sysdate,NPA_REASON,NPA_MANNUALFLAG from npa_prov_acc_data where ACC_NO=? and EXECUTION_NO=? union select distinct EXECUTION_NO,AS_ON_DATE,CUST_ID,CUST_NAME,ACC_NO,ORG_SOLDID,NPA_DATE,SANC_LIMIT,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,COVERAGE_PERCNT,COVERAGE_VAL_PRESENT,UNSEC_OS_LIMIT,PRIME_SEC_VAL, FRAUD_APPLNT,LOAN_TYPE,PROPOSAL_NO,PROPOSAL_SNO,OS_PERCNT,NORM_STATUS,PROV_VALUE,NPA_PROV_USER_ID,(select NVL(max(npa_sno),0)+1 as maxid from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC where ACC_NO=? and EXECUTION_NO=?) as sno,sysdate,NPA_REASON,NPA_MANNUALFLAG from npa_prov_acc_data_old where ACC_NO=? and EXECUTION_NO=?

select EXE_SNO,to_char(EXE_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') as EXE_DATE,EXE_USER,USR_FNAME,EXE_ORG_SOLID,count(distinct(CUST_ID)) as CUST_ID,count(ACC_NO) as ACC_NO,sum(PROV_VALUE) as PROV_VALUE from NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS,NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA,USERS where EXE_USER=USR_ID and EXE_SNO=EXECUTION_NO and EXE_SNO=(select max(EXE_SNO) from NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS) group by EXE_SNO,EXE_DATE,EXE_USER,EXE_ORG_SOLID,USR_FNAME

select EXE_SNO,to_char(EXE_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') as EXE_DATE,EXE_USER,USR_FNAME,EXE_ORG_SOLID,EXE_EXCEPTION from NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS,USERS where EXE_USER=USR_ID and EXE_SNO=(select max(EXE_SNO) from NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS)
select exe_sno,EXE_FILENAME from NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS where EXE_STATUS is null
select ACC_NO from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC where ACC_NO='^'

select cust_id,cust_name,acc_no,to_char(npa_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as npa_date,sanc_limit,os_limit, unreal_int_val,coverage_val_sanc,proposal_no,proposal_sno,loan_type,org_soldid,decode(loan_type,'C','Corporate','A','Agriculture','Retail') as type,NORM_STATUS,PROV_VALUE from npa_prov_acc_data where rownum < 11 order by decode(loan_type,'P','1','A','2','C','3')
select cust_id,cust_name,min(to_char(npa_date,'dd/mm/yyyy')) as npa_date,NORM_STATUS,sum(PROV_VALUE) from npa_prov_acc_data group by cust_id,cust_name,NORM_STATUS

select ORG_SCODE,ORG_NAME,NORM_STATUS,count(ACC_NO),sum(PROV_VALUE) from npa_prov_acc_data,ORGANISATIONS where ORG_SOLDID=ORG_SCODE group by ORG_SCODE,ORG_NAME,NORM_STATUS order by ORG_SCODE,decode(NORM_STATUS,'SS','1',NORM_STATUS)
select NORM_STATUS,count(ACC_NO),sum(PROV_VALUE) from npa_prov_acc_data,ORGANISATIONS where ORG_SOLDID=ORG_SCODE group by NORM_STATUS order by decode(NORM_STATUS,'SS','1',NORM_STATUS)

select decode(LOAN_TYPE,'P','Retail','C','Corporate','A','Agriculture','S','SB/CA') as loantype,NORM_STATUS,count(ACC_NO),sum(PROV_VALUE) from npa_prov_acc_data,ORGANISATIONS where ORG_SOLDID=ORG_SCODE group by LOAN_TYPE,NORM_STATUS order by decode(NORM_STATUS,'SS','1',NORM_STATUS)
update NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS set EXE_DATE=sysdate,EXE_USER=?,EXE_ORG_SOLID=?,EXE_TIME_TAKEN=?,EXE_STATUS=nvl(EXE_STATUS,?) where EXE_SNO=?
select au_usr_id from available_users
delete from NPA_PROV_CVRGE_MASTER
insert into NPA_PROV_CVRGE_MASTER(NPA_SNO,NPA_NORM_STATUS,SEC_PERCNT,UNSEC_PERCNT) values(?,?,?,?)
select NPA_SNO,NPA_NORM_STATUS,SEC_PERCNT,UNSEC_PERCNT from NPA_PROV_CVRGE_MASTER

select (select count(CUST_ID) from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA a where a.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N' and a.ORG_SOLDID=npa2.ORG_SOLDID) as cus_count,ORG_SCODE,ORG_NAME,CUST_NAME,CUST_ID,ACC_NO,NORM_STATUS,NPA_DATE,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, OTHR_CHARGES,(OS_LIMIT-UNREAL_INT_VAL) as netbal,PROV_VALUE,(select cust.SEC_PRSNT_VAL_TOTAL from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID) as sec_assign,(select cust.UNSEC_LIMIT from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID) as unsecured,case when OS_LIMIT-(select cust.SEC_PRSNT_VAL_TOTAL from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID)>0 then 'Yes' else '' end partial_sec, npa2.COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,decode((select cust.AB_INITIO from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID),'Y','Yes','No') as abinitio, decode((select cust.AB_INITIO from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID),'Y',to_char(npa1.EXE_QUARTER,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'') as abinitio_date, decode((select FACILITY_RESTR_FLAG from FACILITIES where FACILITY_APPNO=npa2.PROPOSAL_NO and FACILITY_SNO=npa2.PROPOSAL_SNO),'Y','Yes','No') as restructure,(select to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') from APPLICATIONS where APP_NO=npa2.PROPOSAL_NO and APP_RENEW_FLAG='S') as restr_appr_date,decode(WRITE_OFF,'Y','Yes','No') as writeoff,decode((select cust.FRAUD_ACC from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID),'Y','Yes','No') as fraud_acc,'' as fraud_date from NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS npa1,NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA npa2,ORGANISATIONS where EXE_SNO=EXECUTION_NO and ORG_SOLDID=ORG_SCODE and EXE_SNO='^' and EXE_STATUS='S' and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N' order by ORG_SCODE,CUST_ID

select * from (select o1.ORG_SCODE,o1.ORG_NAME, o2.org_scode as region_code,o2.org_name as region_name,npa2.CUST_NAME,npa2.CUST_ID,npa2.ACC_NO,NORM_STATUS,NPA_DATE,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, OTHR_CHARGES,case when UNSEC_OS_LIMIT<OTHR_CHARGES then UNSEC_OS_LIMIT else UNSEC_OS_LIMIT+OTHR_CHARGES end as netbal,PROV_VALUE,(select cust.SEC_PRSNT_VAL_TOTAL from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID) as sec_assign,(select cust.UNSEC_LIMIT from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID) as unsecured,case when OS_LIMIT-(select cust.SEC_PRSNT_VAL_TOTAL from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID)>0 then 'Yes' else '' end partial_sec, npa2.COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,decode((select cust.AB_INITIO from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID),'Y','Yes','No') as abinitio, decode((select cust.AB_INITIO from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID),'Y',to_char(npa1.EXE_QUARTER,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'') as abinitio_date, decode((select FACILITY_RESTR_FLAG from FACILITIES where FACILITY_APPNO=npa2.PROPOSAL_NO and FACILITY_SNO=npa2.PROPOSAL_SNO),'Y','Yes','No') as restructure,(select to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') from APPLICATIONS where APP_NO=npa2.PROPOSAL_NO and APP_RENEW_FLAG='S') as restr_appr_date,decode(WRITE_OFF,'Y','Yes','No') as writeoff, decode((select cust.FRAUD_ACC from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID),'Y','Yes','No') as fraud_acc,'' as fraud_date, (select sec_name from security_master where sec_id=CUS_SEC_TYPE) as security_type,c.APP_SEC_SECID,(perapp_cbsid||'-'||perapp_fname) as security_ownername, (select (case FACILITY_PROPBANKTYPE when 'S' then 'Sole' when 'C' then 'Consortium' when 'M' then 'Multiple' else '' end) from facilities f where f.facility_appno=app_sec_appno and f.facility_sno=app_sec_facsno) as banking_arrangement ,CUS_SEC_AMOUNT_CHARGED,(case app_sec_securitytype when '1' then 'Primary' when '2' then 'Collateral' else '' end) as Collateral_type, to_char(CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as valuation_date,CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY,SEC_PRESNT_VAL_ASSIGNED as assignedsec,(select cust.SEC_VAL_PRIME_CBS from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID) as PrimeVal from NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS npa1,NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA npa2 left join NPA_PROV_SECURITY p on p.CBS_ACC_NO=npa2.ACC_NO and npa2.EXECUTION_NO=p.EXECUTION_NO left join APP_SECURITYDETAILS c on c.APP_SEC_SECID=p.sec_id and p.PROPOSAL_NO=APP_SEC_APPNO and p.facility_sno=APP_SEC_FACSNO and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' left join CUS_SECURITIES on p.SEC_ID=CUS_SEC_ID left join perapplicant on perapp_oldid=SEC_OWNER_ID and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n',ORGANISATIONS o1,ORGANISATIONS o2 where npa1.EXE_SNO=npa2.EXECUTION_NO and ORG_SOLDID=o1.ORG_SCODE and EXE_SNO='^' and EXE_STATUS='S' and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N' and o2.org_code=substr(o1.org_code,1,6)||'000000000' and o1.org_code like '^%'
union all
select o1.ORG_SCODE,o1.ORG_NAME, o2.org_scode as region_code,o2.org_name as region_name,CUST_NAME,CUST_ID,ACC_NO,NORM_STATUS,NPA_DATE,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, OTHR_CHARGES,case when UNSEC_OS_LIMIT<OTHR_CHARGES then UNSEC_OS_LIMIT else UNSEC_OS_LIMIT+OTHR_CHARGES end as netbal,PROV_VALUE,(select cust.SEC_PRSNT_VAL_TOTAL from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID) as sec_assign,(select cust.UNSEC_LIMIT from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID) as unsecured,case when OS_LIMIT-(select cust.SEC_PRSNT_VAL_TOTAL from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID)>0 then 'Yes' else '' end partial_sec, npa2.COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,decode((select cust.AB_INITIO from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID),'Y','Yes','No') as abinitio, decode((select cust.AB_INITIO from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID),'Y',to_char(npa1.EXE_QUARTER,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'') as abinitio_date, decode((select FACILITY_RESTR_FLAG from FACILITIES where FACILITY_APPNO=npa2.PROPOSAL_NO and FACILITY_SNO=npa2.PROPOSAL_SNO),'Y','Yes','No') as restructure,(select to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') from APPLICATIONS where APP_NO=npa2.PROPOSAL_NO and APP_RENEW_FLAG='S') as restr_appr_date,decode(WRITE_OFF,'Y','Yes','No') as writeoff, decode((select cust.FRAUD_ACC from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID),'Y','Yes','No') as fraud_acc,'' as fraud_date, (select sec_name from security_master where sec_id=CUS_SEC_TYPE) as security_type,c.APP_SEC_SECID,(perapp_cbsid||'-'||perapp_fname) as security_ownername, (select (case FACILITY_PROPBANKTYPE when 'S' then 'Sole' when 'C' then 'Consortium' when 'M' then 'Multiple' else '' end) from facilities f where f.facility_appno=app_sec_appno and f.facility_sno=app_sec_facsno) ,CUS_SEC_AMOUNT_CHARGED,(case app_sec_securitytype when '1' then 'Primary' when '2' then 'Collateral' else '' end) as Collateral_type, to_char(CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as valuation_date,CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY,0 as assignedsec,(select cust.SEC_VAL_PRIME_CBS from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID) from NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS npa1,NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA npa2,ORGANISATIONS o1,ORGANISATIONS o2,APP_SECURITYDETAILS c,CUS_SECURITIES,CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHIP,perapplicant where EXE_SNO=EXECUTION_NO and ORG_SOLDID=o1.ORG_SCODE and EXE_SNO='^' and EXE_STATUS='S' and o2.org_code=substr(o1.org_code,1,6)||'000000000' and o1.org_code like '^%' and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N' and PROPOSAL_NO=APP_SEC_APPNO and PROPOSAL_SNO=APP_SEC_FACSNO and APP_SEC_SECID=CUS_SEC_ID and CUS_SEC_ID=CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID and CUS_OWNER_SNO='1' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and CUS_SEC_TYPE in ('1','2','3','4','7') and perapp_oldid=CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n') tab order by ORG_SCODE,CUST_Id,ACC_NO
select exe_sno,to_char(exe_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as exe_date from NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS order by EXE_SNO desc

insert into npa_prov_acc_data (EXECUTION_NO,AS_ON_DATE,CUST_ID,CUST_NAME,ACC_NO,ORG_SOLDID,NPA_DATE,SANC_LIMIT,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,COVERAGE_PERCNT,COVERAGE_VAL_PRESENT,UNSEC_OS_LIMIT,PRIME_SEC_VAL, FRAUD_APPLNT,LOAN_TYPE,PROPOSAL_NO,PROPOSAL_SNO,OS_PERCNT,NORM_STATUS,PROV_VALUE,OTHR_CHARGES,NPA_SBCA_ACC,WRITE_OFF,NPA_MANNUALFLAG,NPA_REASON,NPA_PROV_USER_ID) values(?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?, ?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select acc_no from npa_prov_acc_data where acc_no='^' and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N'
update npa_prov_acc_data set NPA_DELFLAG=?,NPA_REASON=?,NPA_PROV_USER_ID=? where acc_no=? and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N' and EXECUTION_NO=?
update npa_prov_acc_data_old set NPA_DELFLAG=?,NPA_REASON=?,NPA_PROV_USER_ID=? where acc_no=? and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N' and EXECUTION_NO=?

select distinct(cust_id),cust_name,org_name from npa_prov_acc_data,organisations where org_scode=org_soldid ^ union select distinct(cust_id),cust_name,org_name from npa_prov_acc_data_old,organisations where org_scode=org_soldid ^

select cust_id,cust_name,org_name from (select distinct(cust_id),cust_name,org_name from npa_prov_acc_data,organisations where org_scode=org_soldid ^ union select distinct(perapp_cbsid),perapp_fname,org_name from perapplicant,organisations where org_scode=perapp_branchcode ^) Order by cust_name

update NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC set npa_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),os_limit=?,SANC_LIMIT=?,UNREAL_INT_VAL=?, UNSEC_OS_LIMIT=?,PRIME_SEC_VAL=?,FRAUD_APPLNT=?,NORM_STATUS=?,PROV_VALUE=?,WRITE_OFF=?,OTHR_CHARGES=?,NPA_SBCA_ACC=?,NPA_REASON=?,NPA_VERIFICATION_FLAG='N',NPA_PROV_USER_ID=?,modified_date=sysdate where acc_no=?

select execution_no,to_char(as_on_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as as_on_date,cust_id,cust_name,acc_no,org_soldid,to_char(npa_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as npa_date,sanc_limit,os_limit,unreal_int_val, coverage_val_sanc,coverage_percnt,coverage_val_present,unsec_os_limit,prime_sec_val, fraud_applnt,loan_type,proposal_no,proposal_sno,os_percnt,norm_status,prov_value, decode(loan_type,'C','Corporate','A','Agriculture','S','SBCA Account','Retail') as type,o1.org_name,o2.org_name as regionname,npa_mannualflag,write_off,othr_charges,npa_sbca_acc,npa_reason from npa_prov_acc_data,organisations o1,organisations o2 where o2.org_code like substr(o1.ORG_CODE,0,6)||'%%%%' and o2.org_level='R' and o1.org_scode=org_soldid and cust_id='^' and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N'

insert into NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC_HIS(EXECUTION_NO,AS_ON_DATE,CUST_ID,CUST_NAME,ACC_NO,ORG_SOLDID,NPA_DATE,SANC_LIMIT,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,COVERAGE_PERCNT,COVERAGE_VAL_PRESENT,UNSEC_OS_LIMIT,PRIME_SEC_VAL, FRAUD_APPLNT,LOAN_TYPE,PROPOSAL_NO,PROPOSAL_SNO,OS_PERCNT,NORM_STATUS,PROV_VALUE,npa_sno,modified_date,NPA_REASON,NPA_MANNUALFLAG,OTHR_CHARGES,NPA_SBCA_ACC,WRITE_OFF,NPA_PROV_USER_ID) select distinct EXECUTION_NO,AS_ON_DATE,CUST_ID,CUST_NAME,ACC_NO,ORG_SOLDID,NPA_DATE,SANC_LIMIT,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,COVERAGE_PERCNT,COVERAGE_VAL_PRESENT,UNSEC_OS_LIMIT,PRIME_SEC_VAL, FRAUD_APPLNT,LOAN_TYPE,PROPOSAL_NO,PROPOSAL_SNO,OS_PERCNT,NORM_STATUS,PROV_VALUE,(select NVL(max(npa_sno),0)+1 as maxid from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC_HIS where ACC_NO=? and EXECUTION_NO=? ) as sno,sysdate,NPA_REASON,NPA_MANNUALFLAG,OTHR_CHARGES,NPA_SBCA_ACC,WRITE_OFF,NPA_PROV_USER_ID from npa_prov_acc_data where ACC_NO=? and EXECUTION_NO=? union select distinct EXECUTION_NO,AS_ON_DATE,CUST_ID,CUST_NAME,ACC_NO,ORG_SOLDID,NPA_DATE,SANC_LIMIT,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,COVERAGE_PERCNT,COVERAGE_VAL_PRESENT,UNSEC_OS_LIMIT,PRIME_SEC_VAL, FRAUD_APPLNT,LOAN_TYPE,PROPOSAL_NO,PROPOSAL_SNO,OS_PERCNT,NORM_STATUS,PROV_VALUE,(select NVL(max(npa_sno),0)+1 as maxid from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC_HIS where ACC_NO=? and EXECUTION_NO=?) as sno,sysdate,NPA_REASON,NPA_MANNUALFLAG,OTHR_CHARGES,NPA_SBCA_ACC,WRITE_OFF,NPA_PROV_USER_ID from npa_prov_acc_data_old where ACC_NO=? and EXECUTION_NO=?
delete from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC where ACC_NO=?
select * from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC where ACC_NO='^'

select execution_no,to_char(as_on_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as as_on_date,cust_id,cust_name,acc_no,org_soldid,to_char(npa_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as npa_date,sanc_limit,os_limit,unreal_int_val, coverage_val_sanc,coverage_percnt,coverage_val_present,unsec_os_limit,prime_sec_val, fraud_applnt,loan_type,proposal_no,proposal_sno,os_percnt,norm_status,prov_value, decode(loan_type,'C','Corporate','A','Agriculture','S','SBCA Account','Retail') as type,o1.org_name,o2.org_name as regionname,npa_mannualflag,write_off,othr_charges,npa_sbca_acc,npa_reason,NPA_VERIFICATION_FLAG from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC,organisations o1,organisations o2 where o2.org_code like substr(o1.ORG_CODE,0,6)||'%%%%' and o2.org_level='R' and o1.org_scode=org_soldid and cust_id='^' and NPA_VERIFICATION_FLAG='N' group by execution_no,as_on_date,cust_id,cust_name,acc_no,org_soldid,npa_date,sanc_limit,os_limit,unreal_int_val, coverage_val_sanc,coverage_percnt,coverage_val_present,unsec_os_limit,prime_sec_val, fraud_applnt,loan_type,proposal_no,proposal_sno,os_percnt,norm_status,prov_value, o1.org_name,o2.org_name,npa_mannualflag,write_off,othr_charges,npa_sbca_acc,npa_reason,NPA_VERIFICATION_FLAG
update NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC set NPA_VERIFICATION_FLAG='Y',NPA_PROV_VERIFY_USER_ID=?,modified_date=sysdate where ACC_NO=?
select * from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC where NPA_PROV_USER_ID='^' and ACC_NO='^'

select execution_no,to_char(as_on_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as as_on_date,cust_id,cust_name,acc_no,org_soldid,to_char(npa_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as npa_date,sanc_limit,os_limit,unreal_int_val, coverage_val_sanc,coverage_percnt,coverage_val_present,unsec_os_limit,prime_sec_val, fraud_applnt,loan_type,proposal_no,proposal_sno,os_percnt,norm_status,prov_value, decode(loan_type,'C','Corporate','A','Agriculture','S','SBCA Account','Retail') as type,o1.org_name,o2.org_name as regionname,npa_mannualflag,write_off,othr_charges,npa_sbca_acc,npa_reason from npa_prov_acc_data,organisations o1,organisations o2 ,NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS E where o2.org_code like substr(o1.ORG_CODE,0,6)||'%%%%' and o2.org_level='R' and o1.org_scode=org_soldid and cust_id='^' and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N' and E.EXE_SNO=execution_no and E.EXE_STATUS='S' and execution_no='^'

select execution_no,to_char(as_on_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as as_on_date,cust_id,cust_name,acc_no,org_soldid,to_char(npa_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as npa_date,sanc_limit,os_limit,unreal_int_val, coverage_val_sanc,coverage_percnt,coverage_val_present,unsec_os_limit,prime_sec_val, fraud_applnt,loan_type,proposal_no,proposal_sno,os_percnt,norm_status,prov_value, decode(loan_type,'C','Corporate','A','Agriculture','S','SBCA Account','Retail') as type,o1.org_name,o2.org_name as regionname,write_off,othr_charges,npa_sbca_acc,npa_mannualflag,npa_reason from npa_prov_acc_data_old,organisations o1,organisations o2 ,NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS E where o2.org_code like substr(o1.ORG_CODE,0,6)||'%%%%' and o2.org_level='R' and o1.org_scode=org_soldid and cust_id='^' and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N' and E.EXE_SNO=execution_no and E.EXE_STATUS='S' and execution_no='^' group by execution_no, as_on_date,cust_id,cust_name,acc_no,org_soldid,npa_date,sanc_limit,os_limit,unreal_int_val, coverage_val_sanc,coverage_percnt,coverage_val_present,unsec_os_limit,prime_sec_val, fraud_applnt,loan_type,proposal_no,proposal_sno,os_percnt,norm_status,prov_value, o1.org_name,o2.org_name ,write_off,othr_charges,npa_sbca_acc,npa_mannualflag,npa_reason

select max(EXE_SNO) as exe_sno from( select max(EXE_SNO) as exe_sno from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA, NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS where ^ and EXE_STATUS='S' and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N' and to_char(EXE_QUARTER,'dd/mm/yyyy')='^' and EXECUTION_NO=EXE_SNO union select max(EXE_SNO) as exe_sno from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_OLD, NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS where ^ and EXE_STATUS='S' and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N' and to_char(EXE_QUARTER,'dd/mm/yyyy')='^' and EXECUTION_NO=EXE_SNO )

select count(*)as rowcount from npa_prov_acc_data,organisations o1,organisations o2 ,NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS E where o2.org_code like substr(o1.ORG_CODE,0,6)||'%%%%' and o2.org_level='R' and o1.org_scode=org_soldid and cust_id='^' and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N' and E.EXE_SNO=execution_no and E.EXE_STATUS='S' and execution_no='^'
update NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC set NPA_VERIFICATION_FLAG=?,NPA_PROV_USER_ID=?,modified_date=sysdate where acc_no=?
delete from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC where acc_no=? and EXECUTION_NO=? and (NPA_VERIFICATION_FLAG='N' OR NPA_VERIFICATION_FLAG IS NULL)
delete from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC_HIS where acc_no=? and EXECUTION_NO=? and (NPA_VERIFICATION_FLAG='N' OR NPA_VERIFICATION_FLAG IS NULL)
select exe_sno,to_char(exe_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as exe_date from NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS where to_char(EXE_QUARTER,'dd/mm/yyyy')='^' AND EXE_STATUS='S' order by EXE_SNO desc

update NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA set npa_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),os_limit=?,SANC_LIMIT=?,UNREAL_INT_VAL=?, UNSEC_OS_LIMIT=?,PRIME_SEC_VAL=?,FRAUD_APPLNT=?,NORM_STATUS=?,PROV_VALUE=?,WRITE_OFF=?,OTHR_CHARGES=?,NPA_SBCA_ACC=?,NPA_REASON=?,NPA_PROV_USER_ID=? where acc_no=?

update NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_OLD set npa_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),os_limit=?,SANC_LIMIT=?,UNREAL_INT_VAL=?, UNSEC_OS_LIMIT=?,PRIME_SEC_VAL=?,FRAUD_APPLNT=?,NORM_STATUS=?,PROV_VALUE=?,WRITE_OFF=?,OTHR_CHARGES=?,NPA_SBCA_ACC=?,NPA_REASON=?,NPA_PROV_USER_ID=? where acc_no=? and EXECUTION_NO=?
select count(*) as rowcount from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA where ACC_NO='^' and EXECUTION_NO='^'
select count(*) as rowcount from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_OLD where ACC_NO='^' and EXECUTION_NO='^'
select count(*) as rowcount from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA where EXECUTION_NO='^'
select count(*) as rowcount from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_OLD where EXECUTION_NO='^'

insert into npa_prov_acc_data(EXECUTION_NO,AS_ON_DATE,CUST_ID,CUST_NAME,ACC_NO,ORG_SOLDID,NPA_DATE,SANC_LIMIT,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,COVERAGE_PERCNT,COVERAGE_VAL_PRESENT,UNSEC_OS_LIMIT,PRIME_SEC_VAL, FRAUD_APPLNT,LOAN_TYPE,PROPOSAL_NO,PROPOSAL_SNO,OS_PERCNT,NORM_STATUS,PROV_VALUE,NPA_PROV_USER_ID,NPA_REASON,NPA_MANNUALFLAG,OTHR_CHARGES,NPA_SBCA_ACC,WRITE_OFF)
select distinct EXECUTION_NO,AS_ON_DATE,CUST_ID,CUST_NAME,ACC_NO,ORG_SOLDID,NPA_DATE,SANC_LIMIT,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,COVERAGE_PERCNT,COVERAGE_VAL_PRESENT,UNSEC_OS_LIMIT,PRIME_SEC_VAL, FRAUD_APPLNT,LOAN_TYPE,PROPOSAL_NO,PROPOSAL_SNO,OS_PERCNT,NORM_STATUS,PROV_VALUE,NPA_PROV_VERIFY_USER_ID,NPA_REASON,NPA_MANNUALFLAG,OTHR_CHARGES,NPA_SBCA_ACC,WRITE_OFF from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC where ACC_NO=? and EXECUTION_NO=?

insert into npa_prov_acc_data_old(EXECUTION_NO,AS_ON_DATE,CUST_ID,CUST_NAME,ACC_NO,ORG_SOLDID,NPA_DATE,SANC_LIMIT,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,COVERAGE_PERCNT,COVERAGE_VAL_PRESENT,UNSEC_OS_LIMIT,PRIME_SEC_VAL, FRAUD_APPLNT,LOAN_TYPE,PROPOSAL_NO,PROPOSAL_SNO,OS_PERCNT,NORM_STATUS,PROV_VALUE,NPA_PROV_USER_ID,NPA_REASON,NPA_MANNUALFLAG,OTHR_CHARGES,NPA_SBCA_ACC,WRITE_OFF)
select distinct EXECUTION_NO,AS_ON_DATE,CUST_ID,CUST_NAME,ACC_NO,ORG_SOLDID,NPA_DATE,SANC_LIMIT,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,COVERAGE_PERCNT,COVERAGE_VAL_PRESENT,UNSEC_OS_LIMIT,PRIME_SEC_VAL, FRAUD_APPLNT,LOAN_TYPE,PROPOSAL_NO,PROPOSAL_SNO,OS_PERCNT,NORM_STATUS,PROV_VALUE,NPA_PROV_VERIFY_USER_ID,NPA_REASON,NPA_MANNUALFLAG,OTHR_CHARGES,NPA_SBCA_ACC,WRITE_OFF from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC where ACC_NO=? and EXECUTION_NO=?

insert into npa_prov_acc_data_moc (EXECUTION_NO,AS_ON_DATE,CUST_ID,CUST_NAME,ACC_NO,ORG_SOLDID,NPA_DATE,SANC_LIMIT,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,COVERAGE_PERCNT,COVERAGE_VAL_PRESENT,UNSEC_OS_LIMIT,PRIME_SEC_VAL, FRAUD_APPLNT,LOAN_TYPE,PROPOSAL_NO,PROPOSAL_SNO,OS_PERCNT,NORM_STATUS,PROV_VALUE,OTHR_CHARGES,NPA_SBCA_ACC,WRITE_OFF,NPA_MANNUALFLAG,NPA_REASON,NPA_PROV_USER_ID,NPA_VERIFICATION_FLAG,MODIFIED_DATE) values(?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?, ?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate)

update NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC_HIS set NPA_VERIFICATION_FLAG='Y',NPA_PROV_USER_ID=(select NPA_PROV_USER_ID from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC where ACC_NO=? and EXECUTION_NO=?),modified_date=sysdate, NPA_REASON=(select NPA_REASON from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC where ACC_NO=? and EXECUTION_NO=?),NPA_PROV_VERIFY_USER_ID= (select NPA_PROV_VERIFY_USER_ID from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC where ACC_NO=? and EXECUTION_NO=?) where ACC_NO=? and EXECUTION_NO=?
Update NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC_HIS set NPA_VERIFICATION_FLAG='N' where ACC_NO=? and EXECUTION_NO=? AND (NPA_VERIFICATION_FLAG!='Y' OR NPA_VERIFICATION_FLAG IS NULL)
select acc_no from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_MOC where acc_no='^'

select (select count(CUST_ID) from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_OLD a where a.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N' and a.ORG_SOLDID=npa2.ORG_SOLDID and a.EXECUTION_NO='^') as cus_count,ORG_SCODE,ORG_NAME,CUST_NAME,CUST_ID,ACC_NO,NORM_STATUS,NPA_DATE,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, OTHR_CHARGES,(OS_LIMIT-UNREAL_INT_VAL) as netbal,PROV_VALUE,(select cust.SEC_PRSNT_VAL_TOTAL from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID and cust.EXECUTION_NO='^') as sec_assign,(select cust.UNSEC_LIMIT from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID and cust.EXECUTION_NO='^') as unsecured,case when OS_LIMIT-(select cust.SEC_PRSNT_VAL_TOTAL from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID and cust.EXECUTION_NO='^')>0 then 'Yes' else '' end partial_sec, npa2.COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,decode((select cust.AB_INITIO from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID and cust.EXECUTION_NO='^'),'Y','Yes','No') as abinitio, decode((select cust.AB_INITIO from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID and cust.EXECUTION_NO='^'),'Y',to_char(npa1.EXE_QUARTER,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'') as abinitio_date, decode(WRITE_OFF,'Y','Yes','No') as writeoff,decode((select cust.FRAUD_ACC from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID),'Y','Yes','No') as fraud_acc,'' as fraud_date from NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS npa1,NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_OLD npa2,ORGANISATIONS where EXE_SNO=EXECUTION_NO and ORG_SOLDID=ORG_SCODE and EXE_SNO ='^' and EXE_STATUS='S' and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N' and to_char(npa1.EXE_QUARTER,'dd/MM/yyyy') ='^' order by ORG_SCODE,CUST_ID
select max(EXE_SNO) as MaxSlNo from NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS where EXE_STATUS='S' and to_char(EXE_QUARTER,'dd/MM/yyyy') ='^'

select * from (select o1.ORG_SCODE,o1.ORG_NAME, o2.org_scode as region_code,o2.org_name as region_name,npa2.CUST_NAME,npa2.CUST_ID,npa2.ACC_NO,NORM_STATUS,NPA_DATE,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, OTHR_CHARGES,case when UNSEC_OS_LIMIT<OTHR_CHARGES then UNSEC_OS_LIMIT else UNSEC_OS_LIMIT+OTHR_CHARGES end as netbal,PROV_VALUE,(select cust.SEC_PRSNT_VAL_TOTAL from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID) as sec_assign,(select cust.UNSEC_LIMIT from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID) as unsecured,case when OS_LIMIT-(select cust.SEC_PRSNT_VAL_TOTAL from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID)>0 then 'Yes' else '' end partial_sec, npa2.COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,decode((select cust.AB_INITIO from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID),'Y','Yes','No') as abinitio, decode((select cust.AB_INITIO from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID),'Y',to_char(npa1.EXE_QUARTER,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'') as abinitio_date, decode((select FACILITY_RESTR_FLAG from FACILITIES where FACILITY_APPNO=npa2.PROPOSAL_NO and FACILITY_SNO=npa2.PROPOSAL_SNO),'Y','Yes','No') as restructure,(select to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') from APPLICATIONS where APP_NO=npa2.PROPOSAL_NO and APP_RENEW_FLAG='S') as restr_appr_date,decode(WRITE_OFF,'Y','Yes','No') as writeoff, decode((select cust.FRAUD_ACC from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID),'Y','Yes','No') as fraud_acc,'' as fraud_date, (select sec_name from security_master where sec_id=CUS_SEC_TYPE) as security_type,c.APP_SEC_SECID,(perapp_cbsid||'-'||perapp_fname) as security_ownername, (select (case FACILITY_PROPBANKTYPE when 'S' then 'Sole' when 'C' then 'Consortium' when 'M' then 'Multiple' else '' end) from facilities f where f.facility_appno=app_sec_appno and f.facility_sno=app_sec_facsno) as banking_arrangement ,CUS_SEC_AMOUNT_CHARGED,(case app_sec_securitytype when '1' then 'Primary' when '2' then 'Collateral' else '' end) as Collateral_type, to_char(CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as valuation_date,CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY,SEC_PRESNT_VAL_ASSIGNED as assignedsec,(select cust.SEC_VAL_PRIME_CBS from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID) as PrimeVal from NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS npa1,NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_OLD npa2 left join NPA_PROV_SECURITY_OLD p on p.CBS_ACC_NO=npa2.ACC_NO and npa2.EXECUTION_NO=p.EXECUTION_NO left join APP_SECURITYDETAILS c on c.APP_SEC_SECID=p.sec_id and p.PROPOSAL_NO=APP_SEC_APPNO and p.facility_sno=APP_SEC_FACSNO and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' left join CUS_SECURITIES on p.SEC_ID=CUS_SEC_ID left join perapplicant on perapp_oldid=SEC_OWNER_ID and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n',ORGANISATIONS o1,ORGANISATIONS o2 where npa1.EXE_SNO=npa2.EXECUTION_NO and ORG_SOLDID=o1.ORG_SCODE and EXE_SNO in (select max(exe_sno) from npa_prov_exec_status where trunc(exe_quarter)='^' and exe_status='S') and EXE_STATUS='S' and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N' and o2.org_code=substr(o1.org_code,1,6)||'000000000' and o1.org_code like '^%'
union all
select o1.ORG_SCODE,o1.ORG_NAME, o2.org_scode as region_code,o2.org_name as region_name,CUST_NAME,CUST_ID,ACC_NO,NORM_STATUS,NPA_DATE,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, OTHR_CHARGES,case when UNSEC_OS_LIMIT<OTHR_CHARGES then UNSEC_OS_LIMIT else UNSEC_OS_LIMIT+OTHR_CHARGES end as netbal,PROV_VALUE,(select cust.SEC_PRSNT_VAL_TOTAL from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID) as sec_assign,(select cust.UNSEC_LIMIT from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID) as unsecured,case when OS_LIMIT-(select cust.SEC_PRSNT_VAL_TOTAL from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID)>0 then 'Yes' else '' end partial_sec, npa2.COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,decode((select cust.AB_INITIO from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID),'Y','Yes','No') as abinitio, decode((select cust.AB_INITIO from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID),'Y',to_char(npa1.EXE_QUARTER,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'') as abinitio_date, decode((select FACILITY_RESTR_FLAG from FACILITIES where FACILITY_APPNO=npa2.PROPOSAL_NO and FACILITY_SNO=npa2.PROPOSAL_SNO),'Y','Yes','No') as restructure,(select to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') from APPLICATIONS where APP_NO=npa2.PROPOSAL_NO and APP_RENEW_FLAG='S') as restr_appr_date,decode(WRITE_OFF,'Y','Yes','No') as writeoff, decode((select cust.FRAUD_ACC from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_old cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID),'Y','Yes','No') as fraud_acc,'' as fraud_date, (select sec_name from security_master where sec_id=CUS_SEC_TYPE) as security_type,c.APP_SEC_SECID,(perapp_cbsid||'-'||perapp_fname) as security_ownername, (select (case FACILITY_PROPBANKTYPE when 'S' then 'Sole' when 'C' then 'Consortium' when 'M' then 'Multiple' else '' end) from facilities f where f.facility_appno=app_sec_appno and f.facility_sno=app_sec_facsno) ,CUS_SEC_AMOUNT_CHARGED,(case app_sec_securitytype when '1' then 'Primary' when '2' then 'Collateral' else '' end) as Collateral_type, to_char(CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as valuation_date,CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY,0 as assignedsec,(select cust.SEC_VAL_PRIME_CBS from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_old cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID) from NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS npa1,NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_OLD npa2,ORGANISATIONS o1,ORGANISATIONS o2,APP_SECURITYDETAILS c,CUS_SECURITIES,CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHIP,perapplicant where EXE_SNO=EXECUTION_NO and ORG_SOLDID=o1.ORG_SCODE and EXE_SNO in (select max(exe_sno) from npa_prov_exec_status where trunc(exe_quarter)='^' and exe_status='S') and EXE_STATUS='S' and o2.org_code=substr(o1.org_code,1,6)||'000000000' and o1.org_code like '^%' and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N' and PROPOSAL_NO=APP_SEC_APPNO and PROPOSAL_SNO=APP_SEC_FACSNO and APP_SEC_SECID=CUS_SEC_ID and CUS_SEC_ID=CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID and CUS_OWNER_SNO='1' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and CUS_SEC_TYPE in ('1','2','3','4','7') and perapp_oldid=CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID and nvl(perapp_renew,'n')='n') tab order by ORG_SCODE,CUST_Id,ACC_NO

select npa.execution_no, npa.ORG_SOLDID,(select sol_desc from tbaadm.sol@kbl where sol_id=npa.ORG_SOLDID) ,npa.cust_id,npa.cust_name,npa.acc_no ,npa.sanc_limit*(case row_number() over (partition by npa.acc_no order by null) WHEN 1 THEN 1 else 0 end)mlimit ,npa.os_limit*(case row_nu mber() over (partition by npa.acc_no order by null) WHEN 1 THEN 1 else 0 end)bookbal ,npa.unreal_int_val*(case row_number() over (partition by npa.acc_no order by null) WHEN 1 THEN 1 else 0 end)unr ,(npa.os_limit-unreal_int_val)*(case row_number() over (partition by npa.acc_no order by null) WHEN 1 THEN 1 else 0 end)netbal ,OTHR_CHARGES*(case row_number() over (partition by npa.acc_no order by null) WHEN 1 THEN 1 else 0 end)chrgs ,PROV_VALUE*(case row_number() over (partition by npa.acc_no order by null) WHEN 1 THEN 1 else 0 end)provval ,LOAN_TYPE,npa.PROPOSAL_NO ,PROPOSAL_SNO,NORM_STATUS, (select npa_date from npa_prov_cus_data_old where execution_no=npa.execution_no and cust_id=npa.cust_id)npa_date, (select AB_INITIO from npa_prov_cus_data_old where execution_no=npa.execution_no and cust_id=npa.cust_id) ab_initio, (select COVER_AVAILABLE CGTMSE from npa_prov_cus_data_old where execution_no=npa.execution_no and cust_id=npa.cust_id)cgtmsecover, (select COVER_CLAIMED from npa_prov_cus_data_old where execution_no=npa.execution_no and cust_id=npa.cust_id)cgtmseCLAIM ,WRITE_OFF, sec_id,SEC_SANC_VAL ,SEC_PRESNT_VAL,COMMON_SEC_OWNER,SEC_TYPE,SEC_SANC_VAL_ASSIGNED,SEC_PRESNT_VAL_ASSIGNED,SEC_SANC_VAL_RESIDUAL,SEC_PRESNT_VAL_RESIDUAL,ASSIGN_FLAG,PRIME_SEC_VAL, (select sec_name from cus_securities,security_master where cus_sec_classification=sec_id and cus_sec_id=nsec.sec_id)secname, (select CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE from cus_securities,security_master where cus_sec_classification=sec_id and cus_sec_id=nsec.sec_id)valdate from npa_prov_acc_data_old npa left join npa_prov_security_old nsec on npa.execution_no=nsec.execution_no and npa.acc_no=nsec.cbs_Acc_no where npa.execution_no in (select max(exe_sno) from npa_ prov_exec_status where exe_status='S' and exe_quarter='^')

select (select count(CUST_ID) from NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_OLD a where a.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N' and a.ORG_SOLDID=npa2.ORG_SOLDID and a.EXECUTION_NO='09/05/2022') as cus_count,ORG_SCODE,ORG_NAME,CUST_NAME,CUST_ID,ACC_NO,NORM_STATUS,NPA_DATE,OS_LIMIT,UNREAL_INT_VAL, OTHR_CHARGES,(OS_LIMIT-UNREAL_INT_VAL) as netbal,PROV_VALUE,(select cust.SEC_PRSNT_VAL_TOTAL from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID and cust.EXECUTION_NO='2') as sec_assign,(select cust.UNSEC_LIMIT from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID and cust.EXECUTION_NO='2') as unsecured,case when OS_LIMIT-(select cust.SEC_PRSNT_VAL_TOTAL from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID and cust.EXECUTION_NO='2')>0 then 'Yes' else '' end partial_sec, npa2.COVERAGE_VAL_SANC,decode((select cust.AB_INITIO from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID and cust.EXECUTION_NO='2'),'Y','Yes','No') as abinitio,
decode(WRITE_OFF,'Y','Yes','No') as writeoff,decode((select cust.FRAUD_ACC from NPA_PROV_CUS_DATA_OLD cust where cust.EXECUTION_NO=npa1.EXE_SNO and cust.CUST_ID=npa2.CUST_ID),'Y','Yes','No') as fraud_acc,'' as fraud_date from NPA_PROV_EXEC_STATUS npa1,NPA_PROV_ACC_DATA_OLD npa2,ORGANISATIONS where EXE_SNO=EXECUTION_NO and ORG_SOLDID=ORG_SCODE and EXE_SNO ='2' and EXE_STATUS='S' and nvl(NPA_DELFLAG,'N')='N' and to_char(npa1.EXE_QUARTER,'dd/MM/yyyy') ='2' order by ORG_SCODE,CUST_ID
